import React from 'react' import { Pre, LineNo } from './styles' import Highlight, { defaultProps } from 'prism-react-renderer' import theme from 'prism-react-renderer/themes/nightOwl' import './style.css' import Moment from 'react-moment'; import uniqid from 'uniqid' import TextErea from './TextErea' import API from '../../utils/API'; getLikes = async()=>{ } function Snippets(props) { let snippet_array = [] let comment_array = [] let user_obj = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('okta-token-storage')) let result = [] props.snippets.forEach(snippet=>{ let likeButton=[] let found = false if(result.includes(user_obj.idToken.clientId) && result.includes(snippet._id)){ found = true } if(found){ likeButton.push() }else{ likeButton.push() } snippet.comments.forEach(comm =>{ comment_array.push(
  • {comm.author_name} {snippet.date}

    {comm.body}

    • ) }) snippet_array.push(
    {snippet.author.name} {snippet.date}

    {snippet.title}

    {snippet.desc}

    {({ className, style, tokens, getLineProps, getTokenProps }) => ( 
                                    {tokens.map((line, i) => (
                                    
    
                                        {i + 1}
                                        {line.map((token, key) => )}
                                    
    
                                ))}
    )}     written with : {snippet.lang} This snippet helped {snippet.likes.length} developers
    { likeButton }
    Comments
      {comment_array}
    ) }) return (
    {snippet_array}
    ) } export default Snippets
